function.name: file_encoding

unit.cpp:define: #define LOOKS(NAME, COND) private int looks_ ##NAME(const unsigned char *buf, size_t nbytes, file_unichar_t *ubuf, size_t *ulen) { size_t i; *ulen = 0; for (i = 0; i < nbytes; i++) { int t = text_chars[buf[i]]; if (COND) return 0; ubuf[(*ulen)++] = buf[i]; } return 1; }

macro.name: LOOKS
macro.argument_list: (extended, t != T && t != I && t != X)
